name: Shift Platformer
description:
"Shift Platformer" is a prototype of a 2D platformer about a ghost stuck in between two worlds.

Controls:

  • Move: Left & Right Arrows
  • Jump: "Space"
  • Shift between worlds: "Shift"
  • Level Select: "Tab"
  • Stop Music: "m"
  • Close Game: "Escape"

***IMPORTANT***

For Mac: After opening the .dmg you need to right click the executable and select "Open", then select "Open" again.

For Windows: Extract the .zip file and run the "ShiftPlatformerWindows" binary. Note: The .exe needs to be in the same location as the .pck
